did.abstract: Annual report of the Legislative Board of the Brotherhood of Railroad Trainmen

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of the Annual Report of the Legislative Board of the Brotherhood of Railroad Trainmen in the State of New York, for the year 1961.

controlaccess.corpname: Brotherhood of Railroad Trainmen. Legislative Board

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
